name: Train Simulator 2021: LNER Black Class A3 'Flying Scotsman' Loco
summary: One of the world's most famous locomotives, the Flying Scotsman, is now here for Train Simulator in a new LNER black livery.The Gresley-designed Flying Scotsman has become an icon of British steam, hauling the first non-stop Flying Scotsman train service from London to Edinburgh in 1928 and breaking records ever since.
